_comment: Calendar Sync Tool Configuration Example - See README.md for full documentation
_work_token_path: Required: Path to store work account OAuth token (created automatically on first run)
_google_credentials_path: Required: Path to Google OAuth credentials JSON from Google Cloud Console
_sync_window_weeks: Optional: Weeks to sync forward from start of current week (default: 2)
_sync_window_weeks_past: Optional: Weeks to sync backward from start of current week (default: 0)

_notes.destinations: Required: Array of destination calendars. Events sync to all destinations listed.

destination_fields.name: Optional: Used for logging (defaults to 'Destination N')
destination_fields.token_path: Required for 'google': Path to personal account OAuth token
destination_fields.server_url: Required for 'apple': CalDAV server URL (use 'https://caldav.icloud.com' for iCloud)
destination_fields.password: Required for 'apple': App-specific password from https://appleid.apple.com/account/manage
destination_fields.calendar_name: Optional: Calendar name in destination (default: 'Work Sync')
destination_fields.calendar_color_id: Optional: Google colors 1-11 (default: '7'), Apple uses different system (default: '7')
